live_updates: This issue has now been resolved. Thank you for your patience.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
27100.summary: Some customers in the Grayling Terrace & Waterways areas of Fort McMurray are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
27100.title: Oct 11 – Fort McMurray (Grayling Terrace & Waterways) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
